title: Enter to send, Shift+Enter for newline in chat
description: Chat input should send message on Enter key. Shift+Enter should insert a newline for multi-line messages. Standard chat UX pattern (matches Telegram, Slack, Discord behavior).
close_reason: Enter to send, Shift+Enter for newline implemented

title: Collapsible sidebar and board for compact chat-only mode
description:
Allow the entire sidebar (projects/sessions/views) and the beads board panel to collapse so only the canvas/chat area is showing. Enables a compact mode for non-coding sessions where the full board isn't needed. The app shouldn't have to take the whole screen.

Possible approaches:
- Toggle button or keyboard shortcut to hide sidebar + board
- Remember collapsed state between launches
- Smooth animation for collapse/expand
- Consider a 'Focus Mode' that shows only chat + canvas
close_reason: Collapsible layout with Focus Mode implemented

title: Chat view stops updating / WebSocket events not refreshing UI
description:
Chat window in AgentBoard stops showing new messages after some time. WebSocket connection may still be alive but incoming chat events aren't triggering UI updates. Could be:
- Event stream continuation not being consumed after reconnect
- SwiftUI view not observing the messages array properly
- Event loop task getting cancelled
Need to verify the chat event handling in AppState's event consumption loop and ensure messages array mutations trigger view updates.

title: Clear connection error messages in UI
description:
Show specific, actionable error messages when gateway connection fails:
- 'Device pairing required — run openclaw devices approve on your gateway'
- 'Auth token required'
- 'Gateway not reachable at [URL]'
- 'Device identity mismatch — delete ~/.agentboard/device-identity.json and restart'
Currently fails silently which is bad UX for new users.

title: Clicking task card should expand for viewing/editing
description: Task cards on the board should be clickable to expand into a detail view for viewing full description, editing fields, changing status/priority, adding notes. Currently cards are static display only.

title: Launch Session button not working
description: The Launch Session / New Session dialog is not functional. Clicking to start a new session doesn't work. Need to investigate the session creation flow and fix the connection to the gateway's session creation API.

title: New Session dialog UI cutoff
description:
New Session dialog has multiple layout issues (see screenshot at workspace/agentboard-session-dialog.png):
1. Title 'New Session' is clipped at top — insufficient top padding
2. Cancel/Launch buttons cut off at bottom — dialog height too small for content
3. Needs minimum height or scroll view to prevent overflow
4. The unlabeled text field showing 'AB-uzu' under the agent picker needs a label (Session name? Bead ID?)
Fix: add proper padding, set minimum frame height, ensure all elements visible.

title: New tasks created in AgentBoard board don't persist
description: Creating a new bead/task via the AgentBoard UI does not show up or persist. Likely not writing to the JSONL file or Dolt database correctly. Need to verify the create flow writes to .beads/issues.jsonl and triggers a board refresh.

title: OpenClaw gateway connection testing & fixes
description: AgentBoard has never successfully connected to OpenClaw gateway. Need to test and fix: gateway WebSocket connection, session control, agent chat features, and canvas feature. Blake needs to validate all interactive features work end-to-end.
close_reason: Gateway connection working after device ID hash fix

title: Remove redundant Project/Agent labels above controls in New Session dialog
description: The New Session dialog shows extra 'Project' and 'Agent' labels above the form controls, but the same words are repeated right below on the controls themselves. Remove the redundant labels for a cleaner UI.

title: Improve collapse/expand animation and add toggle button
description:
Current collapse behavior is wrong — the chat area resizes during transitions. Correct behavior:
1. COLLAPSE: Chat stays same size, sidebar and board slide LEFT out of view (chat doesn't move or resize)
2. EXPAND: Sidebar and board slide back in FROM the left, pushing chat area right (chat stays same size)
3. Add a visible expand/retract toggle button above the 'Agent' label at the top-left of the chat panel
4. The toggle should be an arrow or chevron icon indicating direction
5. Animation should be smooth sliding, not crossfade
6. Chat panel width should remain constant throughout the transition

title: Prepare for public release (free)
description: Get AgentBoard ready for public distribution as a free macOS app. Includes: gateway connection working, all features tested, polish, README/docs, distribution method (GitHub release, Homebrew, or Mac App Store free).

title: Remote gateway connection support
description:
Support connecting AgentBoard to a remote OpenClaw gateway (LAN, Tailscale, SSH tunnel). Includes:
- Gateway URL configuration (already exists in Settings)
- Auth token entry and secure storage in Keychain
- Device pairing flow with user-friendly approval instructions
- Tailscale/mDNS gateway discovery (nice-to-have)
- Connection status indicator with reconnect logic
- Documentation for remote setup
